prTitle: feat: integrate file watcher with agent alert pipeline
prBody:
## Summary

- Implement `internal/watcher` package with cross-platform `FileWatcher` satisfying the `agent.Watcher` interface
- Linux backend uses `inotify(7)` via `syscall` package (non-blocking, 50ms poll interval) supporting read/write/create/delete events
- Non-Linux fallback uses 500ms polling via `os.Stat` to detect mtime/size changes
- `FileWatcher` adds goroutine lifecycle management: automatic restart with exponential backoff (1s â†’ 30s max) when the platform watcher errors, structured logging for dropped events
- `cmd/agent/main.go` now calls `buildFileWatchers(cfg, logger)` to create one `FileWatcher` per `FILE`-type rule and registers them with the agent via `agent.WithWatchers`
- Test suite covers: start/stop, 5s event delivery SLA, restart-on-error, context cancellation, interface compliance, and invalid glob handling
- New doc `docs/concepts/tripwire-cybersecurity-tool/file-watcher.md` covers the package API, platform implementations, goroutine lifecycle, configuration, and alert event format

Closes #161
